testcase.system-out: Given kullanici amazon anasayfaya gider.....................................passed Then arama kutusuna Nutella yazip, ENTER tusuna basar.......................passed And arama sonuclarinin Nutella icerdigini test eder.........................passed And sayfayi kapatir.........................................................passed
